content.value:
Solve the crossword puzzle to test your knowledge about choosing a career. 
Each clue will help you fill in the words related to what you've learned. Have fun!

clue.value: I'm what you feel when your work's on the rise, Your job gets better, what a pleasant surprise. What am I?
I'm where skills are sought, you'll soon agree, Where employers seek expertise, come find me. What am I?
I'm what you learn to be really good at, Like playing an instrument or swinging a bat. What am I?
I'm what drives your passion, can't you see, Where your hobbies and desires set you free. What am I?
I'm where jobs are found, it's plain to see, Where employers hire folks like you and me. What am I?
